metadata.name: Uncommon Extension Shim Database Installation Via Sdbinst.EXE
metadata.comment: Detects installation of a potentially suspicious new shim with an uncommon extension using sdbinst.exe. Adversaries may establish persistence and/or elevate privileges by executing malicious content triggered by application shims

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('1') AND endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\sdbinst.exe')) AND lower(process.file.name) = lower('sdbinst.exe') AND NOT (contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('.sdb')) OR (endswith(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' -c')) OR endswith(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' -f')) OR endswith(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' -mm')) OR endswith(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' -t'))) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' -m -bg')) OR process.cmd_line is null OR lower(process.cmd_line) = lower('')))

output.summary: Detects installation of a potentially suspicious new shim with an uncommon extension using sdbinst.exe. Adversaries may establish persistence and/or elevate privileges by executing malicious content triggered by application shims
